content.en: Volatility analysis: Researchers have used algorithms to investigate the impact of sudden changes in volatility on various financial markets. The algorithms, such as the Iterated Cumulative Sums of Squares (ICSS) algorithm, are employed to detect these sudden shifts in variance. By analyzing the effects of volatility on market predictability, persistence, and spillover, these studies provide insights into the dynamics of stock markets and foreign exchange markets.
content.da: Volatilitetsanalyse: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at undersøge virkningen af pludselige ændringer i volatilitet på forskellige finansielle markeder. Algoritmerne, såsom Iterated Cumulative Sums of Squares (ICSS) algoritmen, anvendes til at opdage disse pludselige skift i variansen. Ved at analysere effekterne af volatilitet på markedsforudsigelighed, vedholdenhed og spredning, giver disse studier indsigt i dynamikken på aktiemarkeder og valutamarkeder.
